name: One Tank to Rule Them All
name_original: One Tank to Rule Them All
description:
Game features
  • this game is all about tanks
  • you can speed up or slow down your game
  • unpredictable rebounds
  • memes for any taste and situation
  • original “hand-drawn” graphics
  • 42 hardcore levels

This game features a truly explosive gameplay! You must know exactly when to speed up or slow down, calculate your every move, and have iron nerves!
